mapper.sql: ca_cinema_line.id, ca_cinema_line.name, ca_cinema_line.org_id AS orgId , ca_cinema_line.create_time AS createTime, ca_cinema_line.update_time AS updateTime , ca_cinema_line.note
mapper.select: SELECT ca_cinema_line.* FROM ca_cinema_line WHERE ca_cinema_line.id=#{id} GROUP BY ca_cinema_line.id

SELECT
FROM ca_cinema_line
WHERE 1=1
AND ca_cinema_line.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND ca_cinema_line.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.name},'%')
AND ca_cinema_line.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND ca_cinema_line.update_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.updateTime},'%')
AND ca_cinema_line.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND ca_cinema_line.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND ca_cinema_line.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
And ca_cinema_line.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
ORDER BY create_time DESC
